description:
1. Patience and application will carry us through. 忍耐和专心会使我们渡过难关 。

2. Fortune often rewards with interest those that have patience to wait for her. 做事只要有耐心，到头总会有好运;耐心候好运，好运常会来。

3. All things will come round to him who will but wait. 只要肯等待，一切都会按时来。

4. Where there is life, there is hope. 生命不息，希望长在。

5. Misfortunes tell us what fortune is. 恶运临头后，才知幸运贵。

6. Adversity makes a man wise, not rich. 患难能使人聪明，但不能使人富有。

7. A man becomes learned by asking questions. 要长学问，就得多问。

8. There is no royal road to learning. 学问无坦途。

9. A life without a friend is a life without a sun. 人生没有朋友，犹如生活没有阳光。

10. A little help is worth a deal of pity. 一次行动胜过一筐空话。

11. A little is better than none. 有一点总比没有好。

12. A little knowledge is a dangerous thing. 一知半解，害已误人。

13. A picture is a poem without words. 画为无言诗。

14. Act fairly by all men. 一视同仁。

15. Actions speak louder than words. 事实胜于雄辩。

title: 2015年六级作文：那些让阅卷老师动心的经典谚语（二）
